entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
